original: Krantz, Åke Karl Kristian, direktör, Göteborg, f. 8/1/06 i Gbg av dir. Hugo o. Lisa Krantz. G. 36 m. Gudrun Dyberg. Barn: Eva f. 37, Ingela 39, Hugo 44. — Stud:ex. 24. Praktik på annonsbyrå i London 27 o. 28. Anst. v. Annonsbyrån Hugo Krantz A-B i Gbg fr. 24, dir. där.
translated: Krantz, Åke Karl Kristian, director, Gothenburg, b. 8/1/06 in Gothenburg, son of director Hugo and Lisa Krantz. Married in 1936 to Gudrun Dyberg. Children: Eva b. 1937, Ingela b. 1939, Hugo b. 1944. Completed high school in 1924. Internship at an advertising agency in London in 1927 and 1928. Employed at Annonsbyrån Hugo Krantz A-B in Gothenburg from 1924, became the director there.
